casebody.data:
Edward J. AUSTIN
v.
STATE of North Carolina No. 181P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 7, 2017 Edward J. Austin, for Austin, Edward J. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 7th of June 2017 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Stanly County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of July 2017."
